Let me caveat my response by saying I don't have experience using a watch with the app.

If the watch displays the same notification actions as shown on the phone, it might be a simple case of enabling the delete button to show on the notifications.

Have a look in the app [settings > general settings > notifications] page. Change "Show delete button" to your desired option 2 or 3.

1. "Never" 2. "For single message notifications" 3. "Always"
